_metadata.description: Revised OCL patterns - validated and OCL-compliant

patterns.name: Boolean Guard with Implication
patterns.description: If-then constraint using implies

parameters.name: then_expression
parameters.label: Then Expression
parameters.help_text: What must be true when guard is true

patterns.name: Transitive Closure
patterns.description: Compute transitive closure of a relation

patterns.name: Acyclicity Constraint
patterns.description: Ensure no cycles in graph structure

patterns.name: All Different
patterns.description: All values in collection are distinct
examples: self.vehicles->forAll(v1, v2 | v1 <> v2 implies v1.id <> v2.id)

patterns.name: If-Then-Else Constraint
patterns.description: Conditional constraint with else branch
examples: if self.isPremium then self.discount >= 0.2 else self.discount = 0 endif

patterns.name: XOR Condition
patterns.description: Ensures exactly one of two attributes is defined
patterns.template: (self.{first_attribute} <> null and self.{second_attribute} = null) or (self.{first_attribute} = null and self.{second_attribute} <> null)

patterns.name: Simple Implication
patterns.description: If first attribute is defined, second must be defined

patterns.name: All Attributes Defined
patterns.description: Ensures all specified attributes are defined

patterns.name: At Least One Defined
patterns.description: Ensures at least one of two attributes is defined

patterns.name: Both Defined Or Both Null
patterns.description: Two attributes must both be defined or both be null
patterns.template: (self.{first_attribute} <> null and self.{second_attribute} <> null) or (self.{first_attribute} = null and self.{second_attribute} = null)

patterns.name: Three Attributes Defined
patterns.description: All three attributes must be defined
patterns.template: self.{first_attribute} <> null and self.{second_attribute} <> null and self.{third_attribute} <> null

patterns.name: Reverse Implication
patterns.description: If second attribute defined, first must be defined

patterns.name: Bi-directional Implication
patterns.description: Both attributes must have same null status

patterns.name: Not Both Defined
patterns.description: At most one of two attributes can be defined

patterns.name: Type Check - Is Kind Of
patterns.description: Check if object is instance of type or its subtype

patterns.name: Type Check - Is Type Of
patterns.description: Check if object is exact instance of type (not subtype)

patterns.name: Type Cast - As Type
patterns.description: Cast object to specific type and access attribute

patterns.name: All Instances Check
patterns.description: Check all instances of a type satisfy condition

patterns.name: Conditional Expression
patterns.description: If-then-else conditional logic
patterns.template: if self.{boolean_attribute} then self.{then_attribute} <> null else self.{else_attribute} <> null endif

patterns.name: Conditional Value Selection
patterns.description: Select value based on condition
patterns.template: if self.{first_numeric} > self.{second_numeric} then self.{first_numeric} else self.{second_numeric} endif >= {threshold}

patterns.name: Arithmetic Expression
patterns.description: Mathematical expression with operators

patterns.name: Division and Modulo
patterns.description: Integer division and modulo operations

patterns.name: Absolute, Min, Max
patterns.description: Absolute value, minimum, maximum

patterns.name: If-Then-Else Expression
patterns.description: Conditional arithmetic expression
examples: if self.isPremium then self.price * 0.8 else self.price endif

patterns.name: Numeric Attribute Positive
patterns.description: Ensures numeric attribute is positive

patterns.name: Numeric Attribute Non-Negative
patterns.description: Ensures numeric attribute is non-negative

patterns.name: Numeric Attribute Bounded
patterns.description: Ensures numeric attribute is within range

patterns.description: Numeric attribute must be greater than a specific value

patterns.name: Numeric Less Than Value
patterns.description: Numeric attribute must be less than a specific value

patterns.description: Sum of two numeric attributes meets condition

patterns.name: Numeric Difference Constraint
patterns.description: Difference between two numeric attributes

patterns.name: Numeric Is Even
patterns.description: Numeric attribute must be even

patterns.name: Numeric Is Odd
patterns.description: Numeric attribute must be odd

patterns.name: Numeric Multiple Of
patterns.description: Numeric attribute must be multiple of value

patterns.name: Numeric Absolute Value Bounded
patterns.description: Absolute value of numeric attribute bounded

patterns.name: Maximum Of Two Attributes
patterns.description: Maximum of two numeric attributes meets condition

patterns.name: Minimum Of Two Attributes
patterns.description: Minimum of two numeric attributes meets condition

patterns.name: Three Way Comparison
patterns.description: Three numeric attributes in ascending order

patterns.name: Numeric Product Constraint
patterns.description: Product of two numeric attributes meets condition

patterns.name: Collection Size Constraint
patterns.description: Constrain the size of a collection (e.g., minimum/maximum number of elements)

patterns.name: Uniqueness Constraint
patterns.description: Ensure attribute values are unique across a collection

patterns.name: Numeric Comparison

patterns.name: Range Constraint
patterns.description: Ensure attribute value is within a specific range

patterns.description: Simple boolean condition

patterns.description: Check the type of an object

patterns.description: Compare two string attributes

patterns.description: Ensures attribute is not null/undefined

patterns.description: Ensures the context object exists

patterns.name: Two Attributes Equal
patterns.description: Checks if two attributes have the same value

patterns.description: Checks if two attributes have different values

patterns.name: Boolean Is True
patterns.description: Ensures boolean attribute is true

patterns.name: Boolean Is False
patterns.description: Ensures boolean attribute is false

patterns.description: Attribute must be one of specified values

patterns.name: Attribute Must Be Null
patterns.description: Attribute must be null/undefined

patterns.name: Universal Quantification (forAll)
patterns.description: All elements in collection satisfy a condition

patterns.name: Existential Quantification (exists)
patterns.description: At least one element satisfies condition

patterns.description: Filter collection based on condition

patterns.name: Reject (Exclude) Operation
patterns.description: Exclude elements from collection

patterns.description: Transform collection by extracting attribute

patterns.description: Sum numeric values in collection

patterns.description: Pick any element satisfying condition

patterns.description: Exactly one element satisfies condition

patterns.name: Includes/Excludes Check
patterns.description: Check if a collection includes or excludes specific elements

patterns.name: IncludesAll/ExcludesAll Check
patterns.description: Check if collection includes/excludes all elements from another collection

patterns.name: SortedBy Operation
patterns.description: Sort collection by an attribute or expression

patterns.name: Count Operation
patterns.description: Count occurrences of an element in a collection

patterns.description: Ensures collection association has at least one element

patterns.description: Ensures collection has exact size

patterns.description: Collection size must be within range

patterns.description: Collection must have at least one element

patterns.description: Collection must have at least min elements

patterns.description: Collection cannot exceed max elements

patterns.description: Collection must have no elements

patterns.description: Add element to collection and check size

patterns.description: First element of collection satisfies condition

patterns.description: Last element of collection satisfies condition

patterns.description: Flatten nested collection and check result

patterns.description: Access element at specific index in sequence

patterns.description: Checks if association is set (not null)

patterns.description: Ensures string has minimum length

patterns.description: String attribute cannot exceed maximum length

patterns.description: String attribute starts with prefix

patterns.description: String in uppercase equals value (Z3 limitation: case conversion not encodable)

patterns.name: SortedBy Operation
patterns.description: Sort collection by an attribute or expression
patterns.template: self.{collection}->notEmpty() implies self.{collection}->sortedBy(x | x.{attribute})->first().{attribute} <= self.{collection}->sortedBy(x | x.{attribute})->last().{attribute}

patterns.template: if self.{first_numeric} < self.{second_numeric} then self.{first_numeric} else self.{second_numeric} endif >= {threshold}
